sales_guidelines.greeting: Always greet customers professionally and reference their purchase history.
sales_guidelines.follow_up: Send follow-up emails within 24 hours of any price discussion
sales_guidelines.documentation: Log all pricing discussions in the CRM

negotiation_tactics.anchoring: Start negotiations at list price and work down if necessary
negotiation_tactics.bundling: Offer package deals to increase value perception
negotiation_tactics.urgency: Use time-limited offers sparingly and authentically
negotiation_tactics.alternatives: If price is the main objection, explore payment plans
